member.returns: Returns the currently selected category in the menu.

member.name: M:SotnApi.Interfaces.IGameApi.SetRoomToUnvisited(System.Int64)
member.summary: Sets a room on the map to unvisited. Alucard can discover it again.

member.name: M:SotnApi.Interfaces.IGameApi.SetRoomToVisited(System.Int64)
member.summary: Sets a room on the map to visited. It will not reflect on the map unless a map reload occurs. Library cards and castle switches reload the map.

member.name: M:SotnApi.Interfaces.IGameApi.SetRoomValue(System.Int64,System.Byte)
member.summary: Sets the value for a room on the map. It will not reflect on the map unless a map reload occurs. Library cards and castle switches reload the map.

member.summary: Checks if the game is in Alucard mode.

member.summary: Checks if the game is the Prologue.

member.summary: Checks if the menu si currently open.

member.summary: Overwrites a string in the game.

member.summary: Reads the start menu string, where the Randomizer preset is stored.

member.name: M:SotnApi.Interfaces.IGameApi.ReadSeedName
member.summary: Reads the start menu string, where the Randomizer seed is stored.

member.summary: Enables all the bosses in the game, even if they have been defeated.
